import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import Menu from './Svg/bars-solid.svg' import Close from './Svg/times-solid.svg' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Cart from './Svg/cart.svg' import { DataContext } from './DataProvider' export default function Header() { const [menu, setMenu] = useState(false) const value = useContext(DataContext) const [cart]=value.cart const toggleMenu = () => { setMenu(!menu) } const styleMenu = { left: menu ? 0 : "-100%" } return (
